       Identification Division.
       Program-ID. J7200502.
       Author. Craig Schneiderwent.
      *
      * Return text describing the MQSeries reason code specified
      * in INPT-MQ-RSN-CD.  If the reason code is not found return
      * spaces.
      *
      * 22-Feb-2008 DOTCWS
      * Recompiled to pick up new MQRSNCD1 generated by CMQV Rexx
      * program from MQ v6 reason codes.
      *
       Environment Division.
       Data Division.
       Working-Storage Section.
       COPY MQRSNCD1.
       Linkage Section.
       01  INPT-MQ-RSN-CD   PIC S9(009) Binary.
       01  OTPT-MQ-RSN-TXT  PIC X(030).
       Procedure Division Using
           INPT-MQ-RSN-CD
           OTPT-MQ-RSN-TXT
           .
           SEARCH ALL MQ-RSN-CD-TBL
             AT END
               MOVE SPACES TO OTPT-MQ-RSN-TXT
             WHEN MQ-RSN-CD-NB(MQ-RSN-CD-INDX) EQUAL INPT-MQ-RSN-CD
               MOVE MQ-RSN-CD-TXT(MQ-RSN-CD-INDX) TO OTPT-MQ-RSN-TXT
           END-SEARCH
           GOBACK
           .
